å®å°é«ééè·¯ | color = | logo = | logo_width = | logo_alt = | image = | image_width = | image_alt = | caption = | type = [[High-speed rail]] | system = | status = Proposed | locale = [[People's Republic of China|China]] | start = [[Baoji]] | end = [[Lanzhou]] | stations = | routes = | ridership = | ridership2 = | open = 2015 | close = | owner = | operator = [[China Railway High-speed]] | character = | depot = | stock = | linelength = {{convert|401|km|mi|0|abbr=on}} | tracklength = | notrack = | gauge = {{RailGauge|sg|al=on}} | old gauge = | lgauge = | minradius = | maxincline = | racksystem = | route number= | el = | speed = {{convert|350|km/h|mph|0|abbr=on}} | elevation = | website = | map = | map_state = collapsed }} The '''BaojiâLanzhou High-Speed Railway''' is a proposed [[high-speed railway]] between [[Baoji]] and [[Lanzhou]], in [[China]]. The railway will cut the rail travel between Baoji and Lanzhou from current five hours to one hour and a half. It will connect with [[Xi'anâBaoji High-Speed Railway]] to the east and [[LanzhouâUrumqi High-Speed Railway]] to the west. The feasibility study report has been approved by the [[National Development and Reform Commission]] and the construction work is expected to start in the first half of 2011.http://www.xinhuanet.com/chinanews/2011-03/05/content_22208959.htm Seven stations will be built on the line: Baoji South, Dongcha, Tianshui South, Qin'an, Tongwei, Dingxi, and Lanzhou West. 92% of the total length will be elevated or in tunnels. The total investment is estimated to be CNÂ¥64 billion.http://gs.people.com.cn/GB/183283/14068390.html == References == {{reflist}} {{High-speed rail in the People's Republic of China}} {{coord missing|China}} [[Category:High-speed railway lines in the People's Republic of China]] [[Category:Rail transport in Shaanxi]] [[Category:Rail transport in Gansu]] [[Category:Standard gauge railways in the People's Republic of China]] [[hu:PaocsiâLancsou nagysebessÃ©gÅ± vasÃºtvonal]] [[ja:å®è­æå®¢å°ç¨ç·]] [[zh:å®å°å®¢è¿ä¸çº¿]]
